thread.section_title: Sportbike Track Gear Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sportbike Track Gear | sportbiketrackgear.com
thread.title: Donn
thread.title_full: Sportbike Track Gear reviewed by Donn

author: Donn
title: Donn
text: Great Customer Service. Responds to queries promptly. No delays in the delivery of my packages. Quality control of the products could use a little more attention though as the Scorpion SGS MK II the I purchased came in with the middle and ring finger having the same length, while the Icon Hypersport Prime Hero Jacket doesn't seem to have the same length of cuffs. The overall experience was great and will/ has been recommending your site to my friends. One last thing though, Brian promised to throw in a shirt in one of our email exchanges. never came. :(
